channel.title: Allowing others to connect to my server
channel.description:
im using phonescape using a cable modem: toshiba pcx2200 I can play on my server alone, but people cannot join. I tried that portforwarding website but my modem was not on the list. Then I put my ip in my browser and just got an error.
HALP. :confused: :confused:

item.source: Allowing others to connect to my server

item.title: Allowing others to connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Disable connection via proxy buddy. Your not going to use no-ip or anything.

Thats probably why people have errors.

I’ve compiled your questions and I see your problem. Disable connection via proxy & leave it alone.

When you compile then run your server, in runserver.bat keep it up and it should say Started [servername] on 0.0.0.0:[port here]

Your port will probably be 5555, thats the port people will use.

Read full topic

Give out the port & your Hamachi IP and people should be able to connect.
